title: Verify navigation sidebar accessibility
description: Ensure the navigation sidebar properly displays and allows navigation between Dashboard, Records, Clients, Plans, and Expenses pages.

steps.description: Load BarberApp main interface
Check sidebar is visible on all supported devices and browsers
Click on Dashboard link
Dashboard page is displayed with KPI cards
Click on Records link
Records page with appointment table is displayed
Click on Clients link
Clients page with searchable client list is displayed
Click on Plans link
Plans management interface is displayed
Click on Expenses link
Financial management module page is displayed

title: Validate Dashboard KPI accuracy
description: Verify that daily, monthly, and annual revenue KPIs correctly aggregate revenue from appointments and subscription plans.

steps.description: Create multiple appointments with known payment amounts on various dates
Create subscription plans with known recurring payments linked to clients
Ensure all data is saved and reflected in Supabase
Navigate to Dashboard page
Verify Daily revenue KPI equals sum of payments on the current day
Verify Monthly revenue KPI equals sum of payments in the current month
Verify Annual revenue KPI equals sum of payments in the current year

title: Perform CRUD operations on appointment records
description: Verify the ability to create, read, update, and delete appointment records with inline editing and proper persistence in Supabase.

steps.description: Navigate to Records page
Create a new appointment with valid client, procedure, date, and payment method
New appointment appears in the table and is saved in Supabase
Use inline editing to modify appointment date and procedure
Updated fields are reflected in the UI and database
Delete the created appointment record
Appointment is removed from UI and Supabase

title: Verify client autocomplete functionality in Records page
description: Ensure the autocomplete for clients suggests matches based on input and supports quick selection during appointment creation and editing.

steps.description: Navigate to Records page
Start creating a new appointment
Input partial client name in client field
Autocomplete dropdown shows relevant client suggestions
Select a client from autocomplete suggestions
Selected client populates the appointment client field correctly

title: Validate appointment date conflict and validation logic
description: Verify system prevents creating conflicting or invalid appointments such as those with past dates or overlapping schedules.

steps.description: Navigate to Records page
Attempt to create an appointment on a past date
System shows validation error preventing booking
Create an appointment at a specific date and time
Attempt to create another appointment for the same client and overlapping time
System shows conflict error preventing duplicate booking

title: Test client profile search functionality
description: Verify Clients page search field filters client list accurately based on name or identifier input.

steps.description: Navigate to Clients page
Enter partial or full client name in search field
Clients list is filtered to show only matching clients
Clear search field
Full clients list is restored

title: Manage client subscription plans with billing cycle and renewal
description: Verify Plans page supports creating, editing, and deleting client subscription plans with cycle control, payment tracking, and automatic renewal logic.

steps.description: Navigate to Plans page
Create a new subscription plan for an existing client with defined billing cycle and payment status
New plan is persisted and appears in UI
Edit the subscription plan to update billing cycle or payment history
Plan updates are saved and properly displayed
Simulate passage of cycle time
System triggers automatic renewal and updates payment status accordingly
Delete the subscription plan
Plan is removed from database and UI

title: Record and track financial expenses with payment status
description: Verify Expenses page supports CRUD operations on expenses and credit card information with payment status management and persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to Expenses page
Add a new expense entry with amount, description, date, and payment status
Expense is saved and visible in list
Edit the expense to update amount or payment status
Changes are saved and reflected in UI
Enter credit card details and assign payment statuses
Credit card data is saved and linked to expenses accurately
Delete expense record and credit card entry
Records are removed from the application and persisted storage

title: Test payment method auto-suggestion during appointment creation
description: Verify that payment method field during appointment creation suggests options based on active client subscription plans.

steps.description: Navigate to Records page
Start creating an appointment for a client with active subscription plans
Focus on payment method input field
Payment method suggestions include client's active subscription plan payment options
Select one suggested payment method
Selected payment method populates appointment correctly

title: Verify data synchronization between Supabase and Google Sheets
description: Ensure the data synchronization engine correctly updates the global state from Google Sheets and maintains data consistency with Supabase.

steps.description: Make data changes directly in Google Sheets (appointments, clients, plans, expenses)
Trigger data synchronization process
Changes are reflected accurately and instantly in the BarberApp UI
Consistency between Google Sheets and Supabase data is maintained
Make data changes in BarberApp
Trigger synchronization
Google Sheets data is updated correctly

title: Test theme configuration UI accent color customization
description: Verify the user can change accent colors and personalize UI through the theme configuration settings and changes reflect immediately.

steps.description: Navigate to Theme Configuration interface
Select a new accent color option
UI updates to display new accent color across supported components instantly
Reload the application
Selected accent color persists and is applied correctly
Reset accent color to default
UI returns to default color scheme

title: Validate UI performance and responsiveness across devices and browsers
description: Ensure BarberApp maintains high performance and responsiveness when accessed from various supported browsers and device resolutions.

steps.description: Open BarberApp on multiple browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Safari)
UI loads within acceptable time thresholds without lag
Resize browser window to simulate desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes
UI elements adapt correctly, remain usable and readable
Navigate through primary pages and perform common actions
No UI breakage or performance degradation observed
